title: Grotesque
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142807/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142807/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Grotesque**

This term comes from the German _grotesk_, a term for [Sans Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142807/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sans%20Serif). The word has been anglicized as grotesque.

**Typophile Threads**  
 [Grotesque Sans Serifs](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142807/http:/typophile.com/node/19185)
author: paul d hunt
